1.content:
In the middle of the night in the park, a glowing meteorite crashed into the ground near a tree, where a squirrel lived. The squirrel went over to inspect the space rock and unknowingly absorbed some of its gamma rays, thus becoming a RADIOACTIVE SQUIRREL! Dun dun duuuuun!

The next day you are out taking a walk in the park, enjoying your peaceful surroundings, and as you pass a certain tree...you get attacked by the RADIOACTIVE SQUIRREL! The squirrel leaps out and bites your shoulder, and then scampers back up into the tree. "What was that all about?!" you ask yourself.

Before we continue the story, however, you will need to determine your gender.
1.title: Enter the Radioactive Squirrel

choices: The Doggie Door in the Back
Keep Trying to Open the Door
11.content:
You check the bite marks on your shoulder. It might have had raibies or something like that. First thing tommorrow, you should go to the doctor.

You walk home, and you're right outside your house, when everything gets strange. You start spinning, and you feel an unbearable pain. You lay down on the grass and close your eyes.


Several hours later, you open your eyes to find everything looking pretty normal, and you're actually feeling pretty good again. You stand up, and start walking back to the house.

This is where is became strange. The house was huge, and you couldn't even open the door. You sit down, and think that you might have shrunk somehow. You look down...

"How down I turn into a squirrel???" You say to yourself, but it comes out as a squeak. You don't know what is going on, but the sun is going down, and you have to find a way inside.
11.title: Short awakening

111.content:
You look up at the tree, and over a branch, to an open window. Jackpot! Your sister left the window open. All you had to do was climb...

"How can I climb a tree when I'm so small?" You say to yourself. And then it hits you. Another squirrel quickly scurries up the tree without grabbing branches or anything. Squirrels can climb trees!

You run over, accidentilly stumbling over. Instead of getting up, you keep running, much faster, and more easilly at that.

When you're at the base of the tree, you look up. It seemed so big now. You always climbed it when you were younger, but this was so different. You stick your newfound paw on the tree, and much to your surprise, it firmly sticks there. With a hopeful leap, you get all four paws on, and start to climb upward.

When you get to the branch, you realize how easy it was. It was almost the same as walking, but verticly. As you step onto the branch, your first fear is losing your ballance, but no such thing happens. It's like you knew how to walk a tight rope.

At the end of the branch, you slowly look down. It was a long drop. If you fell, it would surely be the end of not only your Life as a Squirrel, but your whole life at that...
111.title: Tree Climber

1111.content:
There's no way you're sleeping in a tree, you're a human being. You back up, and dash full speed at the window.

As the wind rushes over your fur, you fear that you won't make it. It's like a strong wind blowing you backwards. When you fall face first onto a pink pillow by the window, you jump with glee.

"Hey! A Squirrel!" Says a loud female voice. You look up, and see your little sister standing tall over you. You panic as she grabs you with both hands. "You're so pretty!" She says, pulling on your tail. It hurts, and now you can actually feel it. It felt so natural that you never noticed it.

After a minute or so, she shoves you in a cage with her hampster, and locks it, leaving the room.
1111.title: Captured

choices: "Sure, I'll Take Any Help I Can Get."
"No Thanks, I'll Get Out On My Own."
11112.content:
You bang against the cage furiously, but to no avail. The bars remain strong as you tug at them. "I used to be able to bend this cage with my hands, and now I'm stuck inside of it..." You say out loud, even though nobody is around.

"You could break the cage? How?" Said a voice from behind you. You peek around. Your sister's hampster is talking to you. How can you talk to a hampster? It's not even the same race as you.

"Uh, I used to be a boy." You say, but he doesn't seem to believe you.

"Hey, maybe we can get out of here together. I can't do it alone." He says, looking down.
11112.title: Cell Mate

choices: You manage to communicate with them.
One of them takes you home as a pet.
You do all the cheerleading moves and are kept on as school macot.
You mistakenly bite one of the girls in the squad.
12.content:
So you're female, a great ballet dancer and in the cheerleading squad.

And now, you've been bitten by this radioactive squirrel. You don't know the squirrel is radioactive, however. You just think that you'll have to put something on the bite soon, and you go back home.

At home, you pick up your cheerleading outfit and set out for rehearsal. You decide to walk to school, where the squad is meeting to discuss and practise new moves.

As you walk, you find that your outfit is getting heavier and heavier. You're changing. In fact, you've become a squirrel!

By the time you reach school, you're a full fledged squirrel. You're dragging your cheerleading outfit by the teeth, and you make your way to the basketball court, where all the cheerleaders are meeting.

They're waiting for you, a little annoyed that you are late.

Suddenly, one of them spots your cheerleading outfit, held by a squirrel.
12.title: Cheerleader

125.content: Are you tired of this plot already? You can choose to select a different Origional character, or you can continue with this story. What do you want to do now?
125.title: Don't like the plot?

info.brief_description: You turn into a squirrel and go on many adventures
info.description:
In this interactive you were a normal boy or girl, until one day you were bitten by a radioactive squirrel, and then you became a squirrel yourself. You can do whatever you want, as long as you follow the rules...

1) Second-person must be used

2) No sexual content

3) No anthros (full squirrels only)

Also, other characters can become squirrels as well.

Have fun!
